title: Detection of Developmental Delays and Autism Spectrum Disorder
subject: k
public health

abstracts.abstract: Detection of Developmental Delays and Autism Spectrum Disorder;  Requiring the Department of Health, in collaboration with school districts throughout this state, to develop informational materials for the detection of developmental delays and autism spectrum disorder for parents and guardians of certain students; requiring early learning coalitions to notify parents and guardians of the availability of such informational materials, etc.
